mapper.select: /** DiegoDeploy.selectDiegoListInfo **/ Select d.id as id ,d.iaas_type as iaas_type ,deploy_status ,cf_deployment ,deployment_File ,deployment_name ,diego_encryption_keys ,diego_release_name ,diego_release_version ,cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_name ,cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_version ,director_uuid ,garden_release_name ,garden_release_version ,etcd_release_name ,etcd_release_version ,task_id ,d.update_date as update_date ,d.create_date as create_date From ieda_diego d LEFT JOIN ieda_cf_diego a ON d.id = a.cf_id Where LOWER(d.iaas_type) = #{iaasType} And (a.diego_id is null || d.deploy_status = 'error')

/** DiegoDeploy.selectDiegoInfo **/ Select a.id ,a.iaas_type ,a.create_date ,a.deploy_status ,a.deployment_file ,a.cf_deployment ,a.deployment_name ,a.diego_encryption_keys ,a.diego_release_name ,a.diego_release_version ,a.cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_name ,a.cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_version ,a.director_uuid ,a.garden_release_name ,a.garden_release_version ,a.etcd_release_name ,a.etcd_release_version ,a.task_id ,a.update_date ,(select c.deployment_name from ieda_diego a, ieda_cf c where c.deployment_file = a.cf_deployment and a.id=#{id}) as cfName From ieda_diego a Where id = #{id}

/** DiegoDeploy.selectDiegoKeyInfoById **/ Select d.id as id ,k.id as key_id ,k.key_type as key_type ,iaas_type ,deploy_status ,cf_deployment ,deployment_name ,diego_encryption_keys ,diego_release_name ,diego_release_version ,cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_name ,cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_version ,director_uuid ,garden_release_name ,garden_release_version ,etcd_release_name ,etcd_release_version ,task_id From (select * from ieda_diego where id = #{id} ) d Left Join ieda_key k On d.id = k.id And k.deploy_type=#{deployType} And k.key_type=#{keyType}

/** DiegoDeploy.selectResourceInfoById **/ Select d.id as id ,iaas_type ,deploy_status ,cf_deployment ,deployment_name ,deployment_file ,diego_encryption_keys ,diego_release_name ,diego_release_version ,cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_name ,cflinuxfs2_rootfs_release_version ,director_uuid ,garden_release_name ,garden_release_version ,etcd_release_name ,etcd_release_version ,task_id ,resource.id as resource_id ,resource.deploy_type as resource_deploy_type ,resource.bosh_password as bosh_password ,resource.stemcell_name as stemcell_name ,resource.stemcell_version as stemcell_version ,resource.small_type_flavor as small_type_flavor ,resource.small_type_cpu as small_type_cpu ,resource.small_type_ram as small_type_ram ,resource.small_type_disk as small_type_disk ,resource.medium_type_flavor as medium_type_flavor ,resource.medium_type_cpu as medium_type_cpu ,resource.medium_type_ram as medium_type_ram ,resource.medium_type_disk as medium_type_disk ,resource.large_type_flavor as large_type_flavor ,resource.large_type_cpu as large_type_cpu ,resource.large_type_ram as large_type_ram ,resource.large_type_disk as large_type_disk ,resource.runner_type_flavor as runner_type_flavor ,resource.runner_type_cpu as runner_type_cpu ,resource.runner_type_ram as runner_type_ram ,resource.runner_type_disk as runner_type_disk From (select * from ieda_diego where id = #{id} ) as d Left Join ieda_resource as resource On d.id = resource.id And resource.deploy_type=#{deployType} And resource.id=#{id}
